segment.source: How to Determine BitLocker Encryption State of Lost Computers
segment.target: How to Determine BitLocker Encryption State of Lost Computers

segment.source: How to Determine BitLocker Encryption State of Lost Computers
segment.target: How to Determine BitLocker Encryption State of Lost Computers

segment.source: How to Determine BitLocker Encryption State of Lost Computers
segment.target: How to Determine BitLocker Encryption State of Lost Computers

segment.source: You can use Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) to determine the last known BitLocker encryption status of computers that were lost or stolen.
segment.target: You can use Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) to determine the last known BitLocker encryption status of computers that were lost or stolen.

segment.source: The following procedure explains how to determine whether the volumes on a computer are encrypted if there is a loss or theft.
segment.target: The following procedure explains how to determine whether the volumes on a computer are encrypted if there is a loss or theft.

segment.source: To determine the last known BitLocker encryption state of lost computers
segment.target: To determine the last known BitLocker encryption state of lost computers

segment.source: Open a web browser and navigate to the Administration and Monitoring website.
segment.target: Open a web browser and navigate to the Administration and Monitoring website.

segment.source: Note: The default address for the Administration and Monitoring website is http://computername.
segment.target: Note: The default address for the Administration and Monitoring website is http://computername.

segment.source: Using the fully qualified server name will yield faster browsing results.
segment.target: Using the fully qualified server name will yield faster browsing results.

segment.source: Selects the Report node from the navigation pane, and select the Computer Compliance Report.
segment.target: Selects the Report node from the navigation pane, and select the Computer Compliance Report.

segment.source: Use the filter fields in the right pane to narrow the search results, and then click Search.
segment.target: Use the filter fields in the right pane to narrow the search results, and then click Search.

segment.source: Results are shown below your search query.
segment.target: Results are shown below your search query.

segment.source: Take the appropriate action, as determined by your policy for lost devices.
segment.target: Take the appropriate action, as determined by your policy for lost devices.

segment.source: Device compliance is determined by the BitLocker policies that your enterprise has deployed.
segment.target: Device compliance is determined by the BitLocker policies that your enterprise has deployed.

segment.source: You may want to verify your deployed policies before you try to determine the BitLocker encryption state of a device.
segment.target: You may want to verify your deployed policies before you try to determine the BitLocker encryption state of a device.
